page.title: 11BRONLLWYN HOME FOR THE AGED
page.content: "Bronllwyn," the twenty fifth purpose built Home was constructed at a contract cost of Â£95,260. The building accommodates 36 residents in 24 single and 6 double bedrooms. Although the ground floor units are at different levels, the corridor areas have been gently ramped to avoid the necessity for any steps within the home. A communal dining room, spacious, light and conveniently located can be extended to form a large hall suit- able for the many concert parties, who regularly volunteer to entertain the residents. The dining room is served by a modern kitchen equipped with the latest labour saving devices and appropriate cooking equipment, including a ten gollon bulk water boiler with a direct water connection.
